item.title: New Release - 0.4.0
item.description: This blog post is a little belated, but here it is. This release is just a minor compatibility release to make Cake.Transifex compatible with Cake above version 0.22, while maintaining compatibility with previous releases.
item.author: AdmiringWorm
item.content:encoded:
0.4.0 Compatibility Release

This blog post is a little belated, but here it is. This release is just a minor compatibility release to make Cake.Transifex compatible with Cake above version 0.22, while maintaining compatibility with previous releases.

Release Notes

As part of this release we had 9 commits which resulted in 2 issues being closed.

Feature

  • #16 Update Cake.Core dependency to version 0.22.0

Where to get it

You can download this release from nuget

item.title: New Release - 0.3.0
item.description: As part of this release we had 58 commits which resulted in 8 issues being closed.
item.author: AdmiringWorm
item.content:encoded:
0.3.0 Release

As part of this release we had 58 commits which resulted in 8 issues being closed.

Feature

  • #7 Support the 'Init' command

Improvements

  • #10 Build against Cake.Core version 16.2
  • #9 Start using Cake.Recipe for windows builds
  • #6 Use the Cake Contrib Icon

Documentation

  • #13 Update Readme to be similiar to other Cake addins
  • #12 Configure gitreleasemanager to add package nuget url on releases
  • #11 Start using wyam to document the addin

Where to get it

You can download this release from nuget

item.title: New Release - 0.2.0
item.description: As part of this release we had 1 issue closed.
item.author: AdmiringWorm
item.content:encoded:
0.2.0 Release

As part of this release we had 1 issue closed.

Enhancement

  • #4 Support additional modes when pulling translations

item.title: New Release - 0.1.0
item.description: I'm happy to anounce the first public release of the Cake.Transifex library.
item.author: AdmiringWorm
item.content:encoded:
0.1.0 Release

I'm happy to anounce the first public release of the Cake.Transifex library.

In this release, the following issue was resolved:

Feature

  • #1 Initial Release
